definition: Cornus officinalis/sour mountain date/herb associated with longevity
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
cornelian cherry
cornelian cherry

sentences.english: In this paper, a new way is indicated to the exploitation and utilization of Macrocarpiam officinale.
sentences.chinese: 本研究爲山茱萸的開發利用開闢了新的途徑。

sentences.english: Today is not one of those days. Outside, the sun is shining, birds are chirping and the dogwood tree is getting ready to bloom.
sentences.chinese: 外面，陽光明媚，鳥兒啁啾，山茱萸樹正待開花。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The best harvesting time and quality evaluation of Cornus officinalis is to be further studied.
sentences.chinese: 結論山茱萸的質量評價及採收時間尚待進一步的研究。

sentences.english: People often gather for a party, appreciate chrysanthemums, pin the leaves of Cornus on clothes.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常聚會，賞菊，將山茱萸的葉子帶衣服上。

sentences.english: Named cultivars are grafted onto seedling dogwoods.
sentences.chinese: 指定的品種嫁接到山茱萸的幼苗上。

sentences.english: New taxa of Cornaceae from China.
sentences.chinese: 中國山茱萸科的新分類羣。

sentences.english: The dogwood bud, pale green, is inlaid with russet markings.
sentences.chinese: 山茱萸發芽了，在紅褐色的土壤下襯出淡淡的綠意。

sentences.english: Wild dogwoods are often poorly shaped and have an unevenly developed root system.
sentences.chinese: 野生的山茱萸通常形狀比較差，且根系的生長不均勻。

sentences.english: Object To study the effective portion in Cornus officinalis Sieb. et Zucc. extract (COE) for the treatment of arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 目的對山茱萸提取液抗心律失常有效部位進行研究。

sentences.english: Cornel is sour, but tasty and healthy berry.
sentences.chinese: 山茱萸這種漿果味酸，但好喫且有益健康。

sentences.english: Study on the ultrasonic wave extraction or solvent extraction of tgco from cornus officinal is sieb. et zucc.
sentences.chinese: 超聲波和溶劑法提取山茱萸中總皁甙的工藝研究。

sentences.english: The study aimed to control Cossus orientalis gaede with cornus officinalis as host by biological pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 研究生物農藥防治以山茱萸爲寄主的芳香木蠹蛾。

sentences.english: This is how the stuff looks after 10 days…
sentences.chinese: 這是10天后山茱萸混合物的樣子。

sentences.english: Lacking a proper environment, dogwoods are sometimes difficulty to establish.
sentences.chinese: 沒有合適的環境，山茱萸很難得以生長。

sentences.english: Pale Dogwood increases feminine energy in the air.
sentences.chinese: 淡山茱萸粉添加了女性能量。

sentences.english: Comparative pollen morphology of the Cornaceae and allies.
sentences.chinese: 山茱萸科及相關諸科之花粉粒形態比較研究。

definition: schizandra (Schisandra chinensis)/Magnolia vine
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
poria mushroom (Polyporus umbellatus)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
the root bark of the peony tree
Wolfiporia extensa (a wood-decay fungus)/fu ling/tuckahoe
chuanxiong rhizome
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
Salvia miltiorrhiza
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
bitter orange (Fructus aurantii) (used in TCM)
